name: LILLY HARVEY
profile: Bachelor of Science in Management graduate with professional honors and an Associate of Applied Science in Communications Technology. Certified as Total Quality Management Facilitator and Qualified Master Air Training Command Instructor in Leadership and Management. Currently serving as Squadron Operation Superintendent in the United States Air Force.

trainings: Associate of Applied Science in Communications Technology
